title: Fag Hag
overview: Destiny Rutt is a pathological liar and the last-place shoe-in for the first annual Miss Hope Springs Pageant.  When she meets Scott Bushey – a gay drifter whose ambition is to make it big as the world’s first white HIV-positive rap star “T-Cell”, the two make fast friends and resolve “to take this town of outdated gay guys by storm!”
